resources.string: Audio Feedback adds spoken and audible feedback to Android Wear devices.

Audio Feedback adds spoken feedback for time and notifications. It reads what is currently on the screen in the watch face and notifications and provides additional audio cues. It does not add screen reading functionality to apps. Touching and swiping the screen has the same effect as when Audio Feedback is off. You can also use wrist gestures to navigate. You can use voice actions to call, send texts, and perform other actions.
